title: Things people should try and then play this game,
body:
End up being 35 years old with a broken right arm and a job that does not care if you die,
honestly try it,

after 2 years of crap you still find yourself at square one due to bad medical care,

I eat dirt and crap rocks,

today is my 35th.. not one message or phone call,
i'd rather be dead.
